title: Dangerous virus! LOL!
body_html:
The Center for Disease Control has issued a medical alert about a
highly contagious, potentially dangerous virus that is transmitted
orally, by hand, and even electronically. This virus is called Weekly
OverloadRecreational Killer(WORK). If you receive WORK from your boss,
any of your colleagues, or anyone else via any means whatsoever – DO
NOT TOUCH IT!! This virus will wipe out your private life entirely.

found posted as someone's status on Facebook

highly contagious, potentially dangerous virus that is transmitted
